text: ok, allright, challenges are cool, you don't have to provide him the reflection but you should have it for yourself, because it's a challenge to match it in a first place let alone to eyeball it :slightly_smiling_face:

If you have macbeth and/or ball please match them first, or just put them now in the scene and see how it looks, if it matches it's a good start. Even though that initial match doesn't mean it's  gonna be the final rig :slightly_smiling_face:
Yeah I'm gonna work on the bridge shot at some point this week so will try to match first! :slightly_smiling_face:
